name: StormSections
description:
Boost your Productivity with pleasure!

A Productivity Plugin for JetBrainsâ„¢ IDEs & Android Studio!


Storm Sections Plugin lets you become more productive
by dividing the source code into sections and gives you the ability to
navigate through them by using a beautiful GUI Navigation Bar with 3D Buttons
which represent each section.

After that, it allows you to split sections of your source code
into separate tabs with a single click!






And last but not least, it comes with a powerful 3D ASCII Art Generator
(aka FIGlet) to make sections within code more clear.

Check out the video tutorial in High Definition at the official website!


Compatible IDEs


  • Android Studio
  • IntelliJ IDEA Community
  • IntelliJ IDEA Ultimate
  • PyCharm
  • WebStorm
  • PhpStorm
  • Rider
  • CLion
  • RubyMine
  • AppCode
  • GoLand
  • and so on...

59 Supported Languages

in alphabetical order
  • AngularJS (.html)
  • AppleScript (.applescript)
  • Arduino (.pde, .ino)
  • Bash (.bsh)
  • C/C++ (.c, .cp, .cpp, .h, .hpp)
  • C# (.cs)
  • CoffeeScript (.coffee)
  • CShell (.csh)
  • Dart (.dart)
  • Elixir (.ex, .exs)
  • Elm (.elm)
  • Erlang (.erl)
  • Flow (.flow)
  • Fortran (.f, .for, .f90, .f95, .f03, .f08)
  • GLSL (OpenGL / WebGL) (.glsl, .vert, .frag)
  • Go (.go)
  • Groovy (.groovy)
  • Haxe (.hx)
  • Java (.java)
  • JavaScript (.js)
  • JSON (.json, .jso)
  • Kotlin (.kt, .ktm, .kts)
  • Laravel (.php)
  • Less.js (.less)
  • Lua (.lua)
  • Markdown (.md, .markdown)
  • NASM Assembly (.asm)
  • Nim (.nim)
  • OCaml (.ml, .mli)
  • Perl (.pl, .pm)
  • PHP (.php)
  • PostCSS (.pcss, .postcss)
  • PowerShell (.psl)
  • Protocol Buffers (.proto)
  • Puppet (.pp)
  • Python (.py, .pyw, .pyi)
  • R Language (.R)
  • React (.jsx)
  • Reason (.re, .rei)
  • Ruby (.rb, .rhtml)
  • Rust (.rs)
  • Scala (.scala)
  • Shell Script (.sh)
  • Solidity (.sol)
  • Swift (.swift)
  • TCL (.tcl)
  • TOML (.toml)
  • TypeScript (.ts)
  • Vue.js (.vue)
  • Weex (.we)
  • Windows Batch (.bat, .cmd)
  • Wolfram (.wl, .m)

More Files
  • .HTML
  • .XHTML
  • .XML
  • .XSL
  • .XSLT
  • .CSS
  • .SCSS
  • .SASS
  • .LESS




The Plugin is optimized for better use with Darcula Theme.

jfiglet GNU GPLv2

1.1.5


Added mouse wheel scrolling ability for the navigation toolbar.


1.1.2


Added support for Flow, Laravel & Less.js


1.1.1


Added support for AngularJS, React & Vue.js


1.1.0


Improved button coloring for Darcula theme.


1.0.9


Added compatibility for IntelliJ Platform version IU-211.6085.26.


1.0.8


Added support for html section remarks in mixed html/php files.


1.0.7


Fixed an issue with auto focus after splitting the editors.
Improved the output of the 3D ascii text generator for better readability.
Unsupported characters that corrupted the 3D ascii text generator output are now removed.


1.0.6


Fixed an issue occurring while undoing typing of 3D text.


1.0.5


53 languages are currently supported!


In this version support for the following languages was added:
  • C++ (+added: .hpp)
  • Fortran (.f, .for, .f90, .f95, .f03, .f08)
  • GLSL (OpenGL Shading Language) .glsl, .vert, .frag
  • Markdown (+added: .markdown)
  • NASM Assembly (.asm)
  • OCaml (.ml, .mli)
  • Perl (.pl, .pm)
  • PostCSS (.pcss, .postcss)
  • PowerShell (.psl)
  • Protocol Buffers (.proto)
  • Puppet language (.pp)
  • Python (+added: .pyw, .pyi)
  • Toml language (.toml)
  • Weex Language (.we)
  • Wolfram Language (.wl, .m)


1.0.4


41 languages are currently supported!


In this version support for the following languages was added:
  • Bash (.bsh)
  • CShell (.csh)
  • Elixir (.ex, .exs)
  • Elm (.elm)
  • Lua (.lua)
  • Nim (.nim)
  • R Language (.R)
  • Reason (.re, .rei)
  • Rust (.rs)
  • Shell Script (.sh)
  • Solidity (.sol)
  • SQL (.sql)
  • Windows Batch (.bat, .cmd)


1.0.3


Stability and performance upgrades.


1.0.2


Fixed an issue in the navigation toolbar.


1.0.1


Added backward compatibility to java 8.
Fixed an issue with multiple windows support.


1.0.0


Initial release of the plugin.
